title: Who is using React?
description: Which companies are using react and why?
content: ![Atlassian Logo](./images/logos/atlassian.png) * HipChat Created with React,  * BitBucket * Jira plugins in React * Published Some popular React components > If software is eating the world, then JavaScript is eating software, and React is eating JavaScript...

![AirBnB Logo](./images/logos/airbnb.png) * Website, Mobile * Created Enzyme > Reusability/portability: React components are extremely reusable Refactorability: React tends to make your code very easy to refactor and iterate on.
